original_text: Eyes that show how proud a person is. A mouth that speaks lies. Hands that kill people who have done nothing wrong. Eyes that show how proud a person is.
korean_text: 곧 교만한 눈과 거짓된 혀와 무죄한 자의 피를 흘리는 손과

sentences.original_text: Eyes that show how proud a person is
Hands that kill people who have done nothing wrong
Eyes that show how proud a person is
